venue.address_1: The riverside plaza across from market basket 11 kimball drive suit 124
venue.name: The NH Dog Company

item.description: Its that time a year again and its nice and cool out for the pugs! Patty has passed the torch so we will be hosting the annual Halloween party this year at The NH Dog Company.. pull out your pups favorite costume because there will be prizes for the best costume. It will be a potluck so bring your favorite dish. Looking forward to seeing all my puggy and non puggy friends!

group.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group

item.name: Halloween Party!
